div.p: During the school dismissals resulting from the Coronavirus pandemic, Anaheim Elementary School District is here to support students and families. We have gathered AESD Distance Learning resources for students and a series of vetted community resources for the entire family in one easy to navigate webpage

a.data-title:
As part of @anaheimelementary’s commitment to provide an eSTEAM-D education, students at Price Elementary participated in a production of Aladdin the Musical. In addition to the support from teachers and parents, the school applied for VAPA (visual and performing arts) grants and worked hard to raise funds which paid for supplies to create the sets and costumes.
.
.
.
#Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud #Aladdin #MusicalTheatre

opens in new window
a.span: As part of @anaheimelementary’s commitment to pr

img.alt: As part of @anaheimelementary’s commitment to provide an eSTEAM-D education, students at Price Elementary participated in a production of Aladdin the Musical. In addition to the support from teachers and parents, the school applied for VAPA (visual and performing arts) grants and worked hard to raise funds which paid for supplies to create the sets and costumes. . . . #Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud #Aladdin #MusicalTheatre

a.data-title:
The visual and performing arts give students the safety to explore interests beyond the academic classroom. Price Elementary’s production of Aladdin the Musical provided students a variety of opportunities to shine, whether through set design, back stage production, or taking the stage to sing in front of an audience for the first time.
.
.
.

a.data-title:
Musical theatre productions truly bring together a school community. It took the hard work and dedication of students, teachers, and parents to make Price Elementary School’s production of Aladdin the Musical such a wonderful success!
.
.
.

a.data-title: College & career readiness at @anaheimelementary is supported by the Anaheim Educational Pledge which begins in kindergarten and continues through 12th grade at @anaheimunion schools, mapping out and streamlining the college pathway in partnership with @fullcoll @cypresscollege @csufofficial and @ucirvine.

a.data-title:
James Madison Elementary School 6-graders are at Outdoor Science Camp which gives them the opportunity to explore science in a setting the brings it to life. For many this is also the first time they are away from home, a big milestone for them (and their families!).
.
.
.

a.data-title:
#TBT to Monday’s @anaheimelementary Servathon in honor of the Martin Luther King Jr. Holiday. All 23 schools participated in service learning projects that included neighborhood beautification, care package assembly for foster youth, Valentine’s Day card making for senior citizens, volunteering at a food bank, and SO much more. Giving children the opportunity to serve not only helps them exhibit kindness towards their neighbors, but also helps them see themselves as powerful contributors to their community.
.
.
.

#Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud #Servathon

a.data-title:
#TBT to... last week during the epic @nammfoundation Day of Service at Horace Mann Elementary School. Not only did NAMM Foundation donate $10,000 to our music education program (THANK YOU!), but they also brought together a group of amazing musicians to hold workshops for our students in: ukulele, drum circle, guitar, melodica, and choral/movement. Thank you @ukulenny @remopercussion @justin_emord @berniewilliamsofficial @melodicamen and everyone else who contributed- you are amazing! 📷: @nammfoundation
.
.
.

#Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud #NAMM #NAMMfoundation #NAMMshow

img.alt:
@anaheimelementary Orange Grove Elementary kinder students ready to sing at the Anaheim Día de los Muertos Event. This student-centered event gives students the opportunity to showcase art, language, music, dance, and culture to celebrate the universal themes of life, death, legacy, and community. Thank you @somosanaheim @city_of_anaheim @anaheimplays for giving our students, families, and staff a voice in the community.
#Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud #DayOfTheDead #DiaDeLosMuertos #AnaheimDiaDeLosMuertos #AnaheimDDLM

a.data-title:
Raise your hand if you were at the 95th Anaheim Halloween Parade. 🙋‍♀️🙋‍♂️ We had an incredible time celebrating this community tradition with so many of our students, families, and staff. Our elementary school showcase band with students from all 23 schools had their inaugural performance and we couldn’t have been more proud!
.
.
.
#Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud

a.data-title:
AESD Superintendent, Dr. Christopher Downing, signs the final beam for the new Sunkist Elementary School building that is part of the campus modernization project. Thank you to the citizens of Anaheim for supporting our schools with Bond Measure G/J.
.
.
.

a.data-title:
The Sunkist Elementary School “Topping Off Ceremony” marked a pivotal point in the modernization project. In the construction industry, it is a builders’ rite that takes place when the last beam is placed atop the tallest structure of the project. We are excited that by next school year Sunkist students will be in a modernized new school that supports 21st century learning, and the community will have a beautiful campus that they can be proud of.
.
.
.
#Anaheim #AnaheimElementary #AnaheimSchools #AESD #AmazingAESD #TeamAESD #WhyChooseAnaheim #innovative #diverse #collaborative #eSTEAMD #equity #engaging #Science #Technology #Engineering #Arts #Math #DualLanguage #AnaheimEducationalPledge #OrangeCounty #OrangeCountySchools #PublicSchoolProud #construction #toppingoffceremony #steelwork #steelworkers #trades #tradesman

div.p: Get involved in school activities, sign up to attend events, see upcoming parent meetings or volunteer.
Preparing kids for the world of tomorrow by utilizing the latest technology today.
Through music, students explore multicultural traditions, world history, and languages from around the globe.
Highly impactful experiences that expand classroom content.
Learn how to register your child in an AESD school today.
Learn about our latest employment opportunities and join the team.
Our vision for students, annual goals and actions to achieve success.

div.class: row py-4 bg-white my-2 post aesd-post-wrap aesd-post-19953
div.div:
Free Meals for Children During the school dismissal, free meals are available for children Monday-Friday, 11 a.m. -12 noon. All children, 18 years and under, can pick up a meal at any of the following locations: Katella High School – 2200 E Wagner Ave, Anaheim, CA 92806Anaheim High School – 811 W Lincoln Ave, Anaheim, CA 92805Sycamore Junior High […]
Read More About Free Meals for Children

div.class: row py-4 bg-white my-2 post aesd-post-wrap aesd-post-19938

div.h2: School closure in response to Coronavirus
div.p: Dear Anaheim Elementary School District Families,

Out of an abundance of caution, for the health and safety of all AESD students, staff, and the community, and with the support of the OC Health Care Agency and the Orange County Department of Education, all AESD schools will be closed from Monday, March 16 with an anticipated return on Monday, March 30.

div.a: Read More About School closure in response to Coronavirus

div.class: row py-4 bg-white my-2 post aesd-post-wrap aesd-post-19902
div.div:
Resources for Talking To Children A new type of coronavirus, abbreviated COVID-19, is causing an outbreak of respiratory (lung) disease. It was first detected in China and has now been detected internationally. While the immediate health risk in the United States is low, it is important to plan for any possible outbreaks if the risk level increases in the future.
Read More About Resources for Talking To Children

div.p: Anaheim Elementary School District provides a high-quality education designed to reach and teach all students and to prepare them for a bright and promising future in our rapidly changing world. We seek to develop student responsibility, confidence, creativity, enthusiasm, and strong academic and social skills for lifelong learning.
